title: Remembering Kobe Bryant | Group Chat
description:
Justin Verrier and Rob Mahoney remember Kobe Bryant on the day after the tragic death of the legendary Laker and eight others in a helicopter crash.
Host: Justin Verrier
Guest: Rob Mahoney

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
